description: Switch lighting modes for ultimate illumination. Tactical Mode turns off the side switch and activates the turbo, strobe and mid modes through the tail switch. Outdoor mode works like a regular flahlight. Just two AA batteries operate the LD22, and it gets a big lumen upgrade from 215 to 300. Brighten up any dark corner or trail.Anti-roll, slip-resistant body design made of durable aircraft-grade aluminum.Premium hard-anodized anti-abrasive finish.Toughened ultra-clear glass lens with anti-reflective coating.Utilizes a Cree XP-G2(R5) LED with a lifespan of 50,000 hours.Constant brightness.Powered by 2, AA (Ni-MH/Alkaline) batteries.Stainless steel side body switch for output selection under outdoor mode.Outdoor mode gives you standard flashlight operation. A side switch controls all output modes and the tail switch simply turns the light on and off.Tactical push-button tail cap switch with momentary-on function.2-way pocket clip included.Intelligent memory circuit (under outdoor mode) automatically enters previous used brightness level when turned on.Includes holster, lanyard, 2 spare o-rings, 2 AA (alkaline) batteries, manual, and warranty card.
name: Fenix LD22 Flashlight
